% tight list

  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}

  \setlength{\topsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\partopsep}{0pt}
  \item Engineered \textbf{OVerSeeC}, a training-free system using LLMs and VLMs to generate robot costmaps directly from satellite imagery and natural language commands. 
\item Designed a modular ``Interpret, Locate, Synthesize'' pipeline and deployed it via a web-based GUI for interactive, prompt-conditioned global planning.
\end{itemize}

\textit{Terrain Aware Forward Kinodyanmics Modelling for Close Loop Optimal Control} \hfill Prof. Joydeep Biswas\\
% tight list

  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}

  \setlength{\partopsep}{0pt}
  \item Developed a terrain-aware forward dynamics model to predict complex vehicle behavior, including wheel-terrain contact and airborne maneuvers, surpassing point-mass assumptions. 
\item Improved model robustness for MPC/MPPI controllers by training with adversarial methods (RL, UED) in simulation and fine-tuning on real-world data.
\end{itemize}

\textit{DATT : Deep Adaptive Trajectory Tracking for Quadrotor Control} \hfill Prof. Guanya Shi \& Prof. Byron Boots\\
% tight list
\vspace{-10pt}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parskip}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\topsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\partopsep}{0pt}
  \item Developed \textbf{DATT}, a novel hybrid controller combining model-free RL and L1 adaptive control to track aggressive trajectories and resist wind disturbances.
\item Outperformed MPPI by \textbf{54\%} on infeasible paths and \textbf{34\%} under perturbations, delivering a complete sim-to-real hardware/software stack.
\end{itemize}

\textit{Deep Model Predictive Optimization} \hfill Prof. Guanya Shi \& Prof. Byron Boots\\
% tight list
\vspace{-10pt}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parskip}{0pt}
  \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\topsep}{0pt}
  \setlength{\partopsep}{0pt}
  \item Created a residual-based framework to learn the MPPI optimizer via Reinforcement Learning, drastically reducing sample and memory requirements.
\item Achieved a \textbf{27\% performance increase} and \textbf{4.3$\times$ memory reduction}, enabling agile drone flips with \textbf{8$\times$ fewer samples} (128 vs. 1024) than MPC.
\end{itemize}
